data.name: Cut to the Core
data.detailed_description:
How much of someone can you cut away before there's nothing left? Find out in this chilling kinetic novel - IF YOU DARE!

Story

When Jack Weir checked in for routine surgery he never imagined his life would become a non-stop horror show. Now in the clutches of the mad doctor Lacey Scalia, Jack clings to life and the distant hope that someone - anyone - will save him from her gruesome experiments. Will Jack survive the whims of the doctor? And if he does... WHAT WILL BE LEFT OF HIM?

Gameplay

This ghastly tale is a kinetic novel, meaning a linear text-based game with one ending. Its story and visuals are inspired by classic horror anthology comics like Tales from the Crypt and Creepshow. Length is approximately 3 hours.

data.short_description: How much of someone can you cut away before there's nothing left? Find out in this chilling kinetic visual novel - IF YOU DARE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or higher display is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or higher display is recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 or higher display is recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Cut to the Core is a dark and violent story that deals with mature themes. It contains elements that many may find disturbing or upsetting, including strong language, sexuality, drug abuse, animal abuse, child abuse, abortion, self-harm, gore, body horror and suicide.
